document_data.name: Sunrise Tower
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sunrise Tower''', also colloquially known as '''The Mad Tower''', was an asylum in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] for those of addled and sick mind that was operational in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Sunrise Tower stood on the northwestern side of the [[Trollmarch]] and [[Black Dog Alley]] crossing.
document_data.Services: Under the rulership of the [[Open Lord]] [[Laeral Silverhand]], all admissions and releases were to be personally approved by the Open Lord. The asylum was guarded by a dozen veteran officers of the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] at all times, often referred to as "Trusties". The hospital staff lived in the tower quarters.
document_data.History:
The tower that housed the asylum was the site of the [[Black Dog Tavern]] in the [[1350 DR|1350s DR]] and later the home of [[wizard]] [[Thalandruil]].

From [[1460 DR|1460s DR]] onward, it was used as an asylum.
